Name: Boat Warfare
About the game: Take control of the AI piloted drone boat stolen from the tyrannical nation of Anihc, your mission is to infiltrate behind enemy lines and find out what their plans are before they can launch an attack on the Unified Territories of Acirema and its allies. Play through multiple story chapters and experience the story of a lifetime! Fight through the sewers and into the open ocean in this thrilling action adventure with radio commentary from exciting characters like Radio Guy and Pilot. Battle against an evil country that is hell bent on destroying the nation of Acirema and save the world! KEY FEATURES Environments: Battle against a variety of different enemies in different environments that allow for engaging and exciting battles! Combat: the AI piloted boat is capable of maneuvers most humans couldn't withstand, enjoy smooth responsive movement and satisfying shooting mechanics as you battle through the levels against many different enemies! Evolving story: the story of Boat Warfare doesn't stop with Chapter 1, as time goes on more will be added and new adventures await you in new and exciting locations!
